group.name: Dynamic templates and recursive forms
group.note: These samples were written for the GT2004 presentation about dynamic templates and recursive forms. They illustrate the use of "jx-macros.xml" to interpret form template elements within the generator, allowing the page layout to depend on the contents of the form, and the use of fd:union and fd:class widgets.
